page.title: 08THE MANOR HOUSE
page.content:
{ } THE MANOR HOUSE EAST BRIDGFORD {-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+*-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+- +-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+*-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+
The manor house which is standing there now was built in{1750}but the oringinal manor house was built in 1066.}William the Conqueror was so pleased with one of his knights,he gave him The Manor of East Brigdford, and{500}acres with it. The manor is split into two different parts, one part was built in the Henry Tudor time and the other part was built in Edwardian times.The manor now occupies five acres and is owned by the Murphys who have recently converted it to an old peoples' retirement home to accommodate 14 residents.It has a swimming pool and tennis courts and opened officially on July 1st. {***************************
